Hero.description: This word memorization tool lets you practice memorizing at any time by displaying random words in a pop-up window each time a web page is viewed.

WallOfLove.title: Wall of Love
WallOfLove.description1: If you use this landing page template and recommend it on your Twitter,
WallOfLove.description3: . I will display your tweet and recommendation here.
